client-id.value: {{BOX-OAUTH2-ID|||Box OAuth2 Client Id|||Click "Create an Application" on this page, choose "Box Content", then click "Edit Application", then click "Configure your application". Your app's "Client Id" is located on that settings page.||||||||||||true}}

auth-code.value: {{BOX-AUTH-CODE|||Box Auth Code|||Do not change this value.|||{code}||||||<script>function updateSubmit1(){var rdu="{uri}/install.php?page={page}";var e=document.getElementById('BOX-OAUTH2-ID');var cid=e.value;var REDIRECTURI=rdu;var inps=document.getElementsByTagName("input");for (var i=0;i<inps.length;i++){if (inps[i].name=="BOX-AUTH-CODE" || inps[i].name=="BOX-REDIRECT-URI")continue;REDIRECTURI=REDIRECTURI+"&"+inps[i].name+"="+encodeURIComponent(inps[i].value);if (inps[i].name=="BOX-TOKEN"){inps[i].onchange=updateSubmitGood;}else{inps[i].onchange=updateSubmit1;} };var boxauthurl="https://www.box.com/api/oauth2/authorize?response_type=code&client_id="+cid+"&redirect_uri="+encodeURIComponent(REDIRECTURI);e=document.getElementById('BOX-REDIRECT-URI');e.value=(REDIRECTURI);document.forms[0].action=boxauthurl;};setTimeout(function() {updateSubmit1();},250);</script>|||true}}
